title: Research and Analysis Wing
summary: The Research and Analysis Wing (abbreviated R&AW; Hindi: Anusandhān Aur Viśleṣaṇ Viṅg) is the foreign intelligence agency of India. The agency's primary function is gathering foreign intelligence, counter-terrorism, counter-proliferation, advising Indian policymakers, and advancing India's foreign strategic interests.[4][5][6] It is also involved in the security of India's nuclear programme.[7][5]
